subtitleNullable: COVID19 with Pneumonia and Normal Chest Xray(PA) Dataset
descriptionNullable:
### Context

X-ray samples of COVID-19 were retrieved from different sources for the unavailability of a large specific dataset. Firstly, a total 1401 samples of COVID-19 were collected using GitHub repository [1] , [2] , the Radiopaedia [3] , Italian Society of Radiology (SIRM) [4] , Figshare data repository websites [5] , [6] . Then, 912 augmented images were also collected from Mendeley instead of using data augmentation techniques explicitly [7] . Finally, 2313 samples of normal and pneumonia cases were obtained from Kaggle [8] , [9] .

References:
[1][https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.11597](https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.11597)
[2][https://github.com/agchung](https://github.com/agchung)
[3][https://radiopaedia.org/?lang=gb](https://radiopaedia.org/?lang=gb)
[4][https://www.sirm.org/en/category/articles/covid-19-database/](https://www.sirm.org/en/category/articles/covid-19-database/)
[5][https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/COVID-19_Chest_X-Ray_Image_Repository/12580328/2](https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/COVID-19_Chest_X-Ray_Image_Repository/12580328/2)
[6][https://figshare.com/articles/COVID-19_Image_Repository/12275009/1](https://figshare.com/articles/COVID-19_Image_Repository/12275009/1)
[7][https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/2fxz4px6d8/4](https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/2fxz4px6d8/4)
[8][https://www.kaggle.com/paultimothymooney/chest-xray-pneumonia](https://www.kaggle.com/paultimothymooney/chest-xray-pneumonia)
[9][https://www.kaggle.com/nih-chest-xrays/data](https://www.kaggle.com/nih-chest-xrays/data)


### Content

The dataset is organized into 3 folders (covid, pneumonia , normal) which contain chest X-ray posteroanterior (PA) images. 
 A total of 6939 samples were used in the experiment, where 2313 samples were used for each case.
title: COVID19_Pneumonia_Normal_Chest_Xray_PA_Dataset
